summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log or staff schedule for an individual named T. Noel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates in July and August 2019. It details shift assignments, leave, and overtime, and is significant as it provides a record of staff activity at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

persons.name: T. Noel
persons.context: The individual for whom this daily assignment log is created, showing their shift assignments, days off, and leave at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York during July and August 2019.

events.title: Third Quarter 2019 Staff Assignments
events.description: The document records the daily shift assignments, days off, sick leave, and overtime for staff member T. Noel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York during the third quarter of 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for T. Noel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY.
The log covers dates in July and August 2019, which is the period immediately before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The document shows various assignments including SHU (Special Housing Unit) posts, staff searches, days off, and sick leave.
The record was created or printed on August 12, 2019, at 9:12:51 AM.
